originalText.text: I thought awa was going to do my hair. She had someone else do my braids. The style i wanted was not done obvious the girl could not do it. Of course they said she can do it. I only allowed her to do it because it was late and i needed my hair done. I'm like girl u know what u doing right. That braid don't look  like the braid in the picture. Definitely will not be going back there. .

originalText.text:
Absolutely terrible!!!!!! The last pic is what I asked for and the other pics are what I got. This was my second time coming here and it’s not the place it’s the BRAIDER. She obviously didn’t specialize in knotless braids but she still took me. The root of the braids were terrible you can see the feed ins. Also the part was crooked. I ask for a middle part and it was horrible! She was super slow with braiding got there at 10:30am left at 7pm. Overall experience was terrible. Will be calling in the morning to see if I could get some of my money back. I will update then. Also I left her business card down below so you know who not to go to.

Update: I went back showed the lady and she said she’d do it over. I didn’t want her touching my hair again so I kindly asked her for a refund. She pulled me to the hallway said she didn’t have the money and would cashapp me the next day(she also gave me her personal number) I called the next day and she texted me that she wouldn’t do it. I was already on a plane to NC. She set me up knowing I’m not coming back. I called and texted the owner and she acknowledged the fact that the braids were terrible but said there was nothing she could do. Overall a terrible business. UNPROFESSIONAL, SLOPPY, and CARELESS. would recommend that no one comes here. If I could give 0 stars I would.

originalText.text: My daughter got two braids last minute for picture day Awa is fast and neat

text.text: My daughter got two braids last minute for picture day Awa is fast and neat

originalText.text: Only 4 hours in the chair. A store across the street sells braiding hair (they should really partner up with Awa and give clients discounts which would be a smart move). Awa was very kind, very understanding and a speedy worker. I absolutely loved my mermaid tinted braids and here I am 2 weeks later - braids are still nice and crisp. I am STILL getting compliments from people of all ages and backgrounds. I absolute love it and the price was VERY reasonable especially during these COVID times. Braiders were wearing masks. Fun banter to listen to. Felt like I was going to my Aunts to get my hair done. Will be returning.

originalText.text: If I could give this place a negative one then I would but I can’t so I gave it the lowest rating. I usually go to the African hair braiding places and I’m cool with t culture, the vibe and just breeze in and out to get my hair done. HOWEVER, this place was horrible. It was clean but the level of unprofessionalism is ridiculous. I was asked about my twist outside and I agreed to go upstairs. When I say in the chair I was there for about 1hr and a half before I figured that the braided DID NOT know what she was doing. My twist were super thin. I told her she wasn't using enough hair and then she kept trying to use olive oil gel twist when I told her I was allergic to olive oil. She proceeded to use it again and I had to raise my voice a little (which I hate to do). After that I showed her the Senegalese twist of the woman next to me which looked much better than mines. She said okay she sees the difference and proceeded to move forward. It still was not coming out right. I complained again and asked for it to be fixed. The woman (I guess the owner) who initially brought me upstairs then came and told me switch chairs. I was then told to sit in the chair of a younger girl who looked no more than 18 years old. She started to do my twist and immediately I liked it. While in her chair, she started to argue with the braider next to me who was screaming and slamming her chair and luggage’s of hair down. They also have two hair stylist in the front. The woman was quiet but the guy was EXTREMELY LOUD and very loud with arguing with his customer. Fast forward, I’m sitting in my living room not even a full 6 hours of finishing my hair and it’s unraveling crazy. Now I have to go back tomorrow unfortunately. There was absolutely no licenses hanging up in the place so it should be reported to DOH. It was extremely loud. Kids running up and down and rude braiders who stared and talked about you in their language. I usually don’t complain but PLEASE AVOID THIS PLACE AT ALL COST!!!!!! PLEASE!!! DO NOT GIVE THEM MONEY!!
